Description: General Electric Co. agreed to pay a $1 million civil penalty to settle allegations that it knowingly failed to report to CPSC in a timely manner a defect with certain models of dishwashers.

Haier America Trading LLC agreed to pay a civil penalty of $587,500 to settle allegations that the appliance manufacturer failed to inform CPSC of a defect and fire hazard in the company's Oscillating Tower Fan, model FTM140GG.

Agency: Energy Department Office of General Counsel
Energy Department Office of General Counsel

Description: A state court ordered GE to pay $780,000 to customers and $650,000 in penalties to resolve a case involving allegations of a deceptive dishwasher recall.
